snippet.title: Lovish - Official Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: What if the princess fell in love with the hero's friend instead of the hero? Dive into the story of Lovish and check out gameplay in this new trailer for the upcoming 8-bit action-adventure game. Lovish is an outrageous 8-bit action-adventure unlike any other! Quest with Sir Solomon through a series of bite-sized rooms, as he attempts to free Princess Tsuna, the woman he loves, from the Devil Lord's clutches! Sir Solomon and the Saviors of Light depart Castle Cornelius to free Princess Tsuna from the grasp of the evil Devil Lord! But the knight is worried... What if after being freed, the princess falls in love with one of his friends instead of with him? So he does what anyone would do when blinded by love, and ditches his friends! Solomon ventures into the Devil Lord's castle alone, vowing to steal the princess's heart. Lovish will be available in 2025.
